snippet: Nairo Quintana virtually clinched the Giro d’Italia title Saturday with a strong ride up the demanding Monte Zoncolan, while Michael Rogers of Australia benefited from a fan interruption to post his second stage victory of the race.
abstract: Nairo Quintana virtually clinches the Giro d’Italia title with a strong ride up the demanding Monte Zoncolan.
lead_paragraph: Nairo Quintana virtually clinched the Giro d’Italia title Saturday with a strong ride up the demanding Monte Zoncolan, while Michael Rogers of Australia benefited from a fan interruption to post his second stage victory of the race.

headline.main: Quintana Is on Cusp of Win in Giro d’Italia
headline.print_headline: Quintana Nears Victory in Giro d’Italia
